leftMilestones.title: First Zonal Victory – Iresha Weerapperuma
leftMilestones.desc: Our Dhamma School's first-ever zonal win, led by Iresha Weerapperuma — marking a new era in academic recognition.

leftMilestones.title: First All-Island Representation
leftMilestones.desc: Nadeeka Sanjeewani represented Grade 6 in Gadya Rachana — our very first step onto the national stage.

leftMilestones.title: First Time Zonal Runners-up
leftMilestones.desc: A major milestone — placing second at the zonal level for the first time in Dhamma competition history.

leftMilestones.title: Zonal Champions
leftMilestones.desc: Crowned champions in the zonal Dhamma competition — a sweeping win across multiple categories.

leftMilestones.title: Colombo District Best School
leftMilestones.desc: Recognized as the top Dhamma school in the entire Colombo District for excellence in both academics and ethics.

rightMilestones.title: First All-Island Victory – Ramesh Jayarathne
rightMilestones.desc: Won first place in the 'Daham Danuma' (Dharmacharya) competition — a historical moment for our school.

rightMilestones.title: Record-breaking Victory
rightMilestones.desc: Won with 39 out of 41 students securing placements — the highest achievement in school history.

rightMilestones.title: Island First – Amasha Sharindi
rightMilestones.desc: Amasha Sharindi became the All-Island First in 'Awasana Daham Danuma', setting a new standard in excellence.

rightMilestones.title: All-Island Champions
rightMilestones.desc: Named the Best Dhamma School in the All-Island Competition — a proud victory earned with unity and commitment.
